src:
Dikalahkan Persija dan Tira Persikabo Terus Menurun, Ini Kata RD
03 Nov 2019, 14:01 by Adi Warsono (Kontributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Bekasi - Pelatih Tira Persikabo, Rahmad Darmawan, mengatakan timnya belum beruntung setelah kehilangan poin penuh di kandang Persija Jakarta. Pada pekan ke-26 Liga 1 sore tadi, Minggu 3 November 2019, di Stadion Patriot Candrabhaga, Kota Bekasi, Tira dikalahkan Persija dengan skor 2-0.
"Menurut saya, hari ini Persija mampu mengefektifkan peluang-peluang mereka menjadi gol," kata RD sapaan akrabnya dalam jumpa pers usai laga.
Rahmad mengakui ada beberapa kesalahan dalam laga itu. Tapi, secara keseluruhan anak asuhnya dinilainya tampil bagus dan memberikan perlawanan serta menciptakan peluang. Sampai pertandingan usai anak asuhnya gagal mencetak gol. Bahkan, peluang dari tendangan penalti gagal dikonversikan menjadi gol. "Ada kesalahan iya, tapi secara umum main tidak jelek," ucap RD.
Kalah dari Persija, RD berdalih timnya belum beruntung. Ini tak lepas dari sejumlah peluang yang gagal menjadi gol. "Di sepak bola, kadang-kadang memang kita butuh yang namanya keberuntungan, dan hari ini keberuntungan belum berpihak kepada kita," ujar RD.
Kekalahan dari Persija memperpanjang tren negatif Tira Persikabo. Sebab, pada 11 pertandingan terakhir, klub merger antara PS Tira dan Persikabo Bogot ini belum pernah menang baik di kandang maupun tandang. Walhasil, tim sekarang tercecer di papan tengah atau peringkat tujuh dengan poin 37.

ADI WARSONO
text:
Defeated by Persija and Tira Persikabo Continue to Decline, This Said RD
03 Nov 2019, 14:01 by Adi Warsono (Contributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Bekasi - Trainer Tira Persikabo, Rahmad Darmawan, said his team was not lucky after losing full points at home to Persija Jakarta. On the 26th week of Liga 1 this afternoon, Sunday 3 November 2019, at the Patriot Stadium Candrabhaga, Bekasi City, Tira was defeated by Persija by a score of 2-0.
"In my opinion, today Persija is able to streamline their opportunities into goals," RD said his nickname in a press conference after the match.
Rahmad admitted there were some mistakes in the match. But, overall, foster children are judged to look good and provide resistance and create opportunities. Until the match was over, the team failed to score. In fact, the chances of a penalty shot failed to be converted into a goal. "There was a mistake yes, but in general playing isn't bad," RD said.
Lose from Persija, RD argued his team was not lucky. This is inseparable from a number of opportunities that failed to become goals. "In football, sometimes we really need luck, and today luck is not on our side," RD said.
The defeat of Persija extended Tira Persikabo's negative trend. Because, in the last 11 matches, the club merger between PS Tira and Persikabo Bogot has never won either at home or away. As a result, the team is now scattered in the middle of the board or ranked seventh with 37 points.

ADI WARSONO
